head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CROWLEY, RICHARD LEA

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CROWLEY, RICHARD LEA

block.p: CROWLEY-Richard Lea. 54. On October 13, 2000 of Franklin Square, NY. Formerly of Susquehanna, PA, after a courageous battle with cancer. Beloved husband of Mary Ann (nee) Korba. Loving father of Jennifer Lea Crowley and Mary Beth and Ryan Osborne. Devoted son of Jane Crowley. Dear brother of Fr. Thomas Crowley and Kay and Tom Culnane. Fond uncle of many loving nephews and nieces. Also survived by a loving and caring extended family and numerous friends and co-workers. Visiting at the Fairchild Chapel, Franklin Ave at 12th Street, Garden City, Sunday 2-5 PM and 7-9 PM. Visiting at the Hennessey Funeral Home, Susquehanna, PA, Tuesday 2-4 PM and 7-9PM. Funeral Mass Wednesday 12 noon, St. Johns Evangelist Church, Susquehanna. Interment private. In lieu of flowers, donations to Family and Children's Association, 100 E. Old Country Road, Mineola NY 11501 appreciated.
